intents.name: why_personal_key_invalid
sampleUtterances: Why is my personal key invalid
My personal key is not working
It says that my personal key is invalid

messages.content: You have either typed it incorrectly or you have already used it to sign in and it is no longer valid.
If you used your personal key to sign in, you were given a new one. Use the latest one to sign in.

intents.name: why_security_code_invalid
sampleUtterances: My security code is wrong.
My security code is bad.
My security code is broken.
My security code doesn't work.
My security code is invalid.
Why does it say that my security code is invalid
Inclalid security code.
Why is my security code invalid
The security code is incorrect.
why does my security code not work

messages.content: It likely expired.  Request a new security code and make sure you use the most recent one.

messages.content: Hi! Consider me a guide to your questions for login.gov. Do you have questions on signing in or changing your settings?
How can I help?

intents.name: how_i_change_phone_number
sampleUtterances: How do I change the phone number I use to sign in
I want to change my phone number. How do I change my phone number
How do I update my phone number
I want to update the phone number on file.
I want to update the phone number in my account
I have a new phone.
I have a new phone. I want to update my phone number

messages.content: Select MANAGE ACCOUNT on the top right corner to sign into your account.
Select EDIT next to your current phone number.
Enter your new phone number and select CONFIRM CHANGE. You will receive a new security code on your new phone number.

messages.content: You will need to  reset your accout by deleting it.
https://www.login.gov/help/signing-in/how-do-i-sign-in-if-i-dont-have-my-phone-or-my-phone-number-has-changed/

sampleUtterances: I forgot which email address I used to create an account
I forgot the email address. How do I find out which email address I used
Do you know my email address

messages.content: Try to sign in as usual and ask to have your password reset. Then, enter the email address you believe you used to create your account. If we have your email address in our records, we will send instructions on how to reset your password

intents.name: how_i_change_password
sampleUtterances: How do I change my password
Change password
Change my password

messages.content: Select MANAGE ACCOUNT on the top right corner.
Select EDIT next to password, enter the new password and submit your change.

intents.name: my_reset_password_link_invalid
sampleUtterances: My reset link is invalid
The reset password link is not working
My reset password link is invalid

messages.content: The reset password link might expired. Select RESEND to get a new reset password link
You can also try copying and pasting the confirmation link to the browser. Remove unusual symbols.
If you still have issues, send an email to hello@login.gov

Why can't I use username and password from SAM

messages.content: ou must have a login.gov account to sign into SAM.gov. If you dont have a login.gov account, you need to create one.

why do I need to confirm the email and the phone number

messages.content: You confirm your  email address and phone number to receive important security messages about  account activitiy.

intents.name: what_i_dont_see_usajobs

I dont' see my usajobs account

messages.content: Try https://www.usajobs.gov/Help/faq/account/no-profile/

intents.name: what_phishing
sampleUtterances: What is phishing
Can you explain phishing
Why is phishing bad

messages.content: Phishing is when someone tries to trick you into sharing your password or other personal information online.
Phishing is typically done through email, ads, or by sites that look similar to sites you already use

intents.name: TTP_Trusted_Travelers_Program
sampleUtterances: TTP
CBP
Trusted Traverlers program
I need help with Trusted Travelers program
I cant log into trusted travelers program

messages.content: Your login.gov account and Trusted Traverler's Program (TTP) account information is separate.
If you need help with your TTP account, please visit the TTP FAQs https://ttp.dhs.gov/faq

intents.name: how_i_create_logingov_account
sampleUtterances: How do I create a login.gov account for my family member
How do I register my family for login.gov

messages.content: Each family member will need a unique email address to create a login.gov account.
Trusted Traveler Programs site requires one login.gov account for eachindividual application.

intents.name: do_i_need_pay_again
sampleUtterances: Do I need to pay again
Where do I pay
How much is the fee

messages.content: You do not need to pay to use login.gov.
login.gov is for account access and sign-in only and does not affect or have any information about your Trusted Traveler Programs application

intents.name: how_i_protect_logingov_account
sampleUtterances: How do I protect my login.gov account with a security key
How does a security key protect my account

messages.content: First, you need to have a security key that supports the FIDO standard.
Click MANGE ACCOUNT to sign in. Then select ADD HARDWARE SECURITY KEY.
You will be prompted to give your security key a nickname, connect it, and press the button to register

intents.name: can_help_scheduling_appointment
sampleUtterances: Can you help with scheduling an appointment
How do I schedule an appointment
Id like to schedule an appointment
I want to schedule an appointment
Can you help me to schedule a tsa pre appointment

messages.content: The best way to schedule an appointment is through the Trusted Traveler Programs sitehttps://ttp.cbp.dhs.gov/
login.gov is for account access and sign-in only and does not affect or have any information about your Trusted Traveler Programs application.

intents.name: what_i_i_no_longer
sampleUtterances: What should I do if I no longer have access to the email I used to create my SAM.gov account

messages.content: If you no longer have access to the email you used to create your SAM.gov profile, you will need to create a new SAM.gov profile with your new login.gov account.

intents.name: what_authentication_app
sampleUtterances: Where do I download the authentication app
How does the authentication app work
What's authentication app
Tell me about authentication apps

messages.content: An authentication app generates security codes for signing in to sites that require a high level of security.
Check https://www.login.gov/help/signing-in/what-is-an-authentication-app/ for more details

intents.name: how_i_relink_sam_profile
sampleUtterances: How do I relink my SAM profile after deleting my login.gov account
How can I relink my SAM account with my login.gov account

messages.content: After you delete your account, go to https://sam.gov/ to create a new account.
If you have used the correct email address, your SAM profile will automatically link once youve signed in.

intents.name: can_i_remove_saved_password
sampleUtterances: Can I remove a saved password or login information from my browser
How do I remove saved passwords from my browser
How do I remove saved passwords
How do I removed saved email

messages.content: Yes, you can remove the email saved in your browser. Check the link below
https://www.login.gov/help/privacy-and-security/can-i-remove-a-saved-password-or-login-information-from-my-browser/

intents.name: i_dont_know_passid
sampleUtterances: I dont know my PASSID
What is my PASSID

messages.content: If you have trouble with your PASSID or GOES username and password, please contact CBP directly
Check https://help.cbp.gov/app/ask

intents.name: i_already_logingov_account_email
sampleUtterances: I already have a login.gov account but the email is not the same as my SAM email
my emails are different for SAM and login

messages.content: Your login.gov email address must be the same as your SAM.gov email address to successfully link your SAM profile to your login.gov account.
You can either update your SAM.gov email, or change your login.gov email, or create another login.gov account.

intents.name: why_didnt_i_receive_reset

I didn't receive a reset password email
I didn't get the reset password email
I didn't get theemail to reset my password

messages.content: Check your spam folder
Alternatively, you may have entered a wrong email address. Choose SEND AGAIN to get a new password reset email

intents.name: request_new_security_code
sampleUtterances: i did enter my phone number correctly
my phone number is correct
I have the right number

messages.content: You can request a new security code.
You can receive the code by text message or by a phone call.

I am in a loop on USAjobs website
I can't access USAstaffing
I receives a four zero three error message on USAjobs
My USAjobs account doesnt work
I dont remember the email I used for USAjobs

messages.content: You may be able to find answers to your questions at USAjobs FAQ https://www.usajobs.gov/Help/faq/
If you have any questions about linking your account, please contact the USAJOBS helpdesk.

intents.name: thank_you
sampleUtterances: thank you
thanks

messages.content: You are welcome. Thanks for using the chatbot!

intents.name: reset_account
sampleUtterances: How do I reset my account
I lost access to my two-factor authentication methods
I lost my backup codes

messages.content: You can reset your account by deleting it. Deleting your existing account and creating a new one will allow you to use the same email address and set up new security options.
owever, deleting will remove any agency applications (i.e., USAJOBS, Trusted Traveler, etc.) you have linked to your account, and you will need to relink each account.

intents.name: im_trying_sign_in_doesnt
sampleUtterances: Im trying to sign in but it doesnt work
Im trying to reset my passwordbut I dont get an email

messages.content: Check your spam filter
We might have an incorrect email address on file. If so, you can always create another account with the correct email address.

intents.name: how_delete_account
sampleUtterances: how do i delete my account
I want to delete my account
delete

messages.content: If you are able to sign into your account, please Scroll to the bottom of your profile page and click “delete.” Confirm your password and enter your security code. Click continue. You will then see a message that says your account has been deleted.
If you are unable to sign into your account, please contact hello@login.gov for instructions on how to delete your account.

intents.name: do_i_need_set_security
sampleUtterances: Do I need to set up a security key to use login.gov
Do I need a security key
Do I have to have a security key for login.gov

messages.content: You do not need to use a security key to use login.gov. However, all login.gov accounts must be set up with a two-factor method.
You can set up two-factor authentication by phone call, text message, authentication app, or a security key. A security key is the most secure two-factor method.

intents.name: why_dont_i_see_sam
sampleUtterances: Why dont I see my SAM profile information after I create my login.gov account and sign in
I don't see my SAM profile
Where is my SAM profile

messages.content: If you are an existing SAM user and dont see your SAM.gov profile after signing in, this means you did not use the same email address you registered with SAM.gov.
Select MANAGE ACCOUNT to sign in your login.gov account. Click EDIT next to your current email.
Update your email address to match your SAM.gov registered email

intents.name: what_status_application
sampleUtterances: What is the status of my tsa application
Where can I check my tsa pre application
what is the status of my tsa pre application

messages.content: Sign in to https://ttp.cbp.dhs.gov/to find out the status of your application
login.gov is for account access and sign-in only and does not affect or have any information about your Trusted Traveler Programs application

intents.name: how_i_relink_trusted_traveler
sampleUtterances: How do I relink my Trusted Traveler profile after deleting my login.gov account
how do I link my traveler's profile

messages.content: Create a new login account.
In the account profile page, select YES under HAVE YOU EVER APPLIED FOR GLOBAL ENTRY, NEXUS, or SENTRI?
https://www.login.gov/help/trusted-traveler-programs/relink-my-profile/

intents.name: how_i_set_authentication_app
sampleUtterances: How do I set up an authentication app
I want to set up the authentication app
How can I set up the authentication app
How do I set up a security key

messages.content: Install an authentication app to your device. Here is how:https://www.login.gov/help/changing-settings/how-do-I-set-up-an-authentication-app/
Click MANAGE ACCOUNT to sign in.
Select ENABLE next to Authentication app.

intents.name: DOT_FMCSA_CDL
sampleUtterances: DOT FMCSA CDL
Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration FMCSA Commercial Drivers License Drug and Alcohol Clearinghouse Portal
I am having trouble logging into the Commercial Drivers License Drug and Alcohol Clearinghouse Portal

messages.content: If you are having issues signing into the Department of Transportation's (DOT) Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration (FMCSA) Commercial Driver’s License Drug and Alcohol Clearinghouse Portal, please make sure you are accessing the correct portal link found here: https://clearinghouse.fmcsa.dot.gov/Register
You can contact FMCSA’s Help desk by going to clearinghouse.fmcsa.dot.gov and click on "Contact" or call 1-800-832-5660

intents.name: why_sam_using_logingov
sampleUtterances: Why is SAM using login.gov
Why use login.gov for SAM
Why not SAM
Why login SAM
Why does SAM use login.gov
Why connect SAM with login.gov
Why login.gov for SAM
How does SAM and login.gov relate to each other

messages.content: By using login.gov, youll get an extra layer of security to help protect your SAM.gov profile against password compromises.

If you are an existing SAM user, use the same email address you registered within SAM.gov so we can automatically link your SAM.gov profile to your login.gov account. If you use a different email address, we wont be able to link your profile automatically.
For more questions related to SAM.gov, check https://sam.gov/SAM/pages/public/help/samQUserGuides.jsf

intents.name: should_i_use_gov_mil
sampleUtterances: Should I use a gov mil and edu email address
I don't have a gov email address
I am in the military
Should I use my work address
Which email address should I use

messages.content: We recommend you dont use a .gov, .mil or .edu email address, because if you leave your government or military position or school, you wont have access to that email address anymore.

intents.name: why_didnt_i_receive_confirmation
sampleUtterances: I didn't get an email
Why didn't I receive a confirmation email from login.gov
No confirmation email
I didn't get a confirmation email
I don't see a confirmation email
I didn't receive any email from login.gov
I didn't get any confirmation email
I did not get an email confirmation
why didn't I receive a confirmation email from login.gov

messages.content: Please check your spam folder for an email from no-reply@login.gov or an email from the @mail.login.gov domain, as our emails are sometimes incorrectly put there. If you add “no-reply@login.gov” to your contact list, your email provider will not send it to spam. Once this is done, please try requesting another email.
If you are still not receiving our emails, it is possible that although your email address is valid, it is not recognized by our system. We suggest using a different email address.USAjobs

intents.name: what_i_account_already_exists
sampleUtterances: What do i do if an account already exists under my email address
Account already exists
Old account
Someone is using my email
There is already an email account

messages.content: You can reset your password at https://secure.login.gov/users/password/new
If you are sure you  didn't create the account, contact hello@login.gov

intents.name: what_email_address_i_use
sampleUtterances: What email address do I use to create a login.gov account
What kind of email do I use for usajobs account
Which email should I use for usajobs

messages.content: When you use the same email address, USAJOBS will automatically link your profile to the login.gov account.

intents.name: what_i_need_order_sign
sampleUtterances: What do I need to have in order to sign in
How do I use login.gov
How do I use this site
How do I use login
How do I log in
How do I sign in
How to sign in

messages.content: Every time you log into your account, you will need your email address, your password, and access to your phone.
After you have entered your email address and password, login.gov will send to your phone a security code, which you will need to enter into the security code field in order to be logged in securely.

intents.name: how_i_make_password_strong
sampleUtterances: How do I make my password strong
What are your password rules
What kind of passwords do you allow
What password should I use

messages.content: Your password should be at least 8 characters long. Try using multiple words and spaces to create a memorable phrase.
Longer passwords with many words are stronger than short passwords with special characters.

intents.name: why_i_locked_logingov
sampleUtterances: My account is locked
I am locked out. What can I do
Why am I locked out of login.gov

messages.content: You entered the security code incorrectly three times or you requested too many security codes at once. Please wait for 10 minutes and try again

intents.name: what_security_key
sampleUtterances: What is a security key
what's a security key
a security key
can you explain a security key to me
what is a key
what is a yubico key
what is a FIDO security key

messages.content: A security key is usually a piece of physical hardware, like a USB, that you can carry on your keychain. You can also use supporting software, such as a web browser extension or other services.
When choosing a security key, look for compatibility with the FIDO standard.

password reset
get new password
new password
i forgot my password

I forgot my passwords.

messages.content: Click FORGOT YOUR PASSWORD in the login page
https://secure.login.gov/users/password/new

My phone is not working right now. Can I still sign in
I can't use my phone right now
My phone is broken
I don't have my phone today
If I don't have my phone with me can I still sign in

messages.content: Yes, if you have your  16-character person key. Select Choose another security option to  enter your person key.
You will be given a  new personal key if you use the current key.

change email

Select EDIT next to your current email address.
Enter the new email address and submit it.

intents.name: how_i_create_account_logingov
sampleUtterances: How do I create an account with login.gov
How do I register with login.gov
Get a new account
Register a new account
Apply for a new account
How do I register
how do i sign up
register
registration
sign up

messages.content: To create a login.gov account youll need a valid email address and a working phone number.
Go to https://secure.login.gov/sign_up/enter_email to sign up
Here is the step by step tutorial https://www.login.gov/help/creating-an-account/how-do-i-create-an-account-with-logingov/

intents.name: does_using_security_key_mean
sampleUtterances: Does using a security key mean Im completely safe from phishing
Does security make me safe

messages.content: If you have a security key enabled, login.gov will ask you to use it every time you log in. If you are not asked to use a security key during the login process, this could be a warning that you are not at the real login.gov website.
To stay safe when using login.gov, expect to use your security key consistently to log in.

intents.name: when_i_sign_in_shows
sampleUtterances: When I sign in it only shows my login.gov account information and theres no way to get back to the Trusted Traveler Programs site
I can't see my Trusted Traveler program info.
I can't access Trusted Traveler Programs

messages.content: If you want to access your Trusted Traveler Programs (TTP) account, always start at https://ttp.cbp.dhs.gov/

intents.name: i_dont_phone_can_i
sampleUtterances: I don't have a phone
My phone is not working

messages.content: You can use an  authentication application instead of a phone number for two factor  authentication.

intents.name: what_twofactor_authentication
sampleUtterances: Tell me about two-factor authentication
Can you explain two factor authentication to me
two-factor authentication
two factor authentication
What does two factor authentication mean
What is two factor authentication
What is two factor authentications
how do I use two factor authenitcation
wat is two factor authenitcation
what is two factor
what is authentication application
what is two factor authentication

messages.content: It means we ask you to sign into an account via two different methods.
This keeps your account more secure.

intents.name: what_personal_key
sampleUtterances: What do I do with the personal key
Can you explain what a personal key is
a personal key
what is my personal key

messages.content: It's a 16-character code to help you sign in if you can't verify authentication via your phone.
This is the only way  to recover your account, make sure to print it out or take a screenshot.

intents.name: how_i_get_new_personal
sampleUtterances: How do I get a new personal key
How can I get a new personal key.
Can I get a new personal key

messages.content: To request a new personal key, select MANAGE ACCOUNT on the top right corner.
Once you are in your account page, select GET A NEW KEY.
You can only request a new personal key if you are able to sign into your login.gov account

intents.name: what_happen_usajobs_profile
sampleUtterances: What will happen to my USAJOBS Profile
How about my usajobs profile
What happens to my profile on usajobs
What will happen to my usa job profile
What is going to happen to my usa jobs profile
What about my profile on usajobs
What about my profile on usa jobs
what about my profile on usa job
usajobs profile
What will happen to my usajobs file
What happens to my data on usajobs

messages.content: Nothing will happen to the information stored in your USAJOBS profile. Youll keep all of your applications, saved searches and saved jobs.
Once you set up a login.gov account, well link it back to your USAJOBS profile. The only difference is youll use your login.gov email address, password and security code to sign into USAJOBS.

intents.name: how_i_change_sam_account
sampleUtterances: How do I change my SAM account settings
How can I update SAM settings

messages.content: Select MANAGE ACCOUNT on the top right corner to sign in your login.gov account.
Select My Account Settings from the sub-navigation menu on your My SAM page.
Select Edit User Information.

intents.name: how_i_relink_usajobs_profile
sampleUtterances: How do I relink my USAJOBS profile after deleting my login.gov account
How can I relink my usajobs account with my login.gov account

messages.content: See step by step guidance on how to relink your USAJOBS profile and login.gov account here: https://login.gov/help/usajobs/reset-or-relink-my-logingov-account-for-usajobs/
You can also get help at https://www.usajobs.gov/Help/faq/account/login-gov/

intents.name: what_i_need_receive_logingov
sampleUtterances: What do I need to receive the login.gov security code
How can I get login.gov security code

messages.content: You can choose to receive the one time security code via text or phone call if you have a U.S. based cell phone.
You can also use an authentication app after you create your account

confirmation link is invalid
can't confirm

Why doesn't it confirm

messages.content: Your comfirmation  link likely expired. Select "resend" to get a new confirmation  email.
You can also try  copying and pasting the confirmation link to the browser. Remove unusual  symbols.
If you still have  issues, send an email to hello@login.gov
Hi, consider me a guide to your questions for login.gov. Do you have questions on signing in or changing your settings? How can I help?
Sorry that I can't understand you. Please try emailing hello@login.gov to get more help.
